privacyComplianceList: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) in the European Union
adherenceSteps: Terms of use: https://okfn.org/terms-of-use/ Privacy policy: https://okfn.org/privacy-policy/

standardsList: We support the FAIR data standard by helping make data more Findable Accessible Interoperable and Reusable.

harassmentProtectionSteps: We have a Code of Conduct: https://frictionlessdata.io/work-with-us/code-of-conduct/ and we have a community manager who, together with the core team, moderates the channels where the interactions among users take place.
